rootFile.description: The root file of the NGINX config file(s). It must match one of the files' filepath.

AnalysisCreate.description: The request body for creating an analysis for an NGINX configuration.

AnalysisDiagnostic.description: An error object found during the analysis of an NGINX configuration.

file.description: The filepath of the most relevant config file.

line.description: Line number where the error was found.

AnalysisResult.description: The response body for an analysis request. Contains the status of the analysis and any errors.

AnalysisResultContent.description: Analysis result data containing errors and diagnostics.

errors.description: List of errors found during analysis.

diagnostics.description: List of diagnostics found during analysis.

secretText.description: The secret text for the API key

endDateTime.description: Expiry of the key in UTC date-time format.

hint.description: This is the name of the API key.

Azure.ResourceManager.CommonTypes.Manage.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

type.description: The type of managed identity assigned to this resource.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The identities assigned to this resource by the user.

Azure.ResourceManager.CommonTypes.SkuUpd.description: The resource model definition representing SKU

name.description: The name of the SKU. Ex - P3. It is typically a letter+number code

tier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

Azure.ResourceManager.ResourceSkuPropert.description: The SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) assigned to this resource.

sku.description: The SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) assigned to this resource.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

CertificateListResult.description: The response of a Certificate list operation.

value.description: The Certificate items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

CertificateUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the Certificate.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

CertificateUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the Certificate.

keyVirtualPath.description: The virtual path to the key file. This is a path that would be used in an Nginx configuration file, for example, /etc/nginx/ssl/key.key.

certificateVirtualPath.description: The virtual path to the certificate file. This is a path that would be used in an Nginx configuration file, for example, /etc/nginx/ssl/cert.pem.

keyVaultSecretId.description: The Key Vault secret ID. Example: `https://myvault.vault.azure.net/secrets/mysecret/1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef`.

sha1Thumbprint.description: The SHA1 thumbprint of the certificate.

keyVaultSecretCreated.description:
The creation time of the Key Vault secret in UTC RFC 3339 format.
Example: `2025-07-08T10:11:08.856Z`.

certificateError.description: Error details for the certificate, if any.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ConfigurationListResult.description: The response of a Configuration list operation.

value.description: The Configuration items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ConfigurationUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the Configuration.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ConfigurationUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the Configuration.

DeploymentWafPolicyApplyingStatus.description: Applying status for a WAF policy.

code.description: The apply status code. Can be any free form text

time.description: The timestamp when apply status was recorded in UTC.

DeploymentWafPolicyCompilingStatus.description: Compilation status for a WAF policy.

code.description: The compilation status code. Can be any free form text

time.description:
The timestamp when compilation status was recorded in UTC timezone and RFC 3339 format.
Example: `2025-07-08T10:11:08.856Z`.

DiagnosticItem.description: A diagnostic is a message associated with an NGINX config. The Analyzer returns diagnostics with a level indicating the importance of the diagnostic with optional category.

id.description: Unique identifier for the diagnostic error type. Generated by the analyzer as a free form text.

directive.description: The directive being analyzed. This is a free form text that can be used to identify the directive.

file.description: The filepath of the most relevant config file.

line.description: Line number where the diagnostic was found.

rule.description: Rule that triggered the diagnostic. Rule names can be any free form text that can be used to identify.

category.description: Category of warning like Best-practices, Recommendation, Security etc. Can be any free form text.

DiagnosticLevel.description: Diagnostic level indicating the importance of the diagnostic.

IdentityProperties.description: Managed identity properties for the deployment.

values.name: SystemAndUserAssigned
values.description: Both system and user assigned managed identities.

NginxCertificateErrorResponseBody.description: Error details for a certificate resource.

NginxCertificateProperties.description: Properties of an Nginx certificate resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the certificate.

keyVirtualPath.description: The virtual path to the key file. This is a path that would be used in an Nginx configuration file, for example, /etc/nginx/ssl/key.key.

certificateVirtualPath.description: The virtual path to the certificate file. This is a path that would be used in an Nginx configuration file, for example, /etc/nginx/ssl/cert.pem.

keyVaultSecretId.description: The Key Vault secret ID. Example: `https://myvault.vault.azure.net/secrets/mysecret/1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef`.

sha1Thumbprint.description: The SHA1 thumbprint of the certificate.

keyVaultSecretCreated.description:
The creation time of the Key Vault secret in UTC RFC 3339 format.
Example: `2025-07-08T10:11:08.856Z`.

certificateError.description: Error details for the certificate, if any.

content.description: File content in Nginx configuration format, base64 encoded.

data.description: Package data. This is base64 encoded content of the files archive.

protectedFiles.description:
List of protected files in the package.
These are standard file paths relative to the archive uploaded

contentHash.description: Content hash of the file using SHA-256 algorithm.

contentHash.description: Content hash of the file using SHA-256 algorithm.
